message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.CY. 

The paper discusses expert recommendation in community question answering, which involves techniques for matching questions with potential answerers. This topic is closely related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL), as well as social networks (cs.SI) and data mining (cs.SD) for analyzing user behavior and preferences. Additionally, the paper may touch on ethical and legal issues related to online communities (cs.CY).
